name: Corona Lock Space Station
description:
A first-person game set in space where you have to show ur moving skills but also a little bit of wit.

Let the virus chase you and let it enter into the decontamination room. Once inside, close the door and find the decontamination button to get the area free from corona invasion.

Music pieces are taken from the "Royalty-Free Legacy Music Pack" by Forgotten Dawn

Made for "My first GameJam:  Winter 2021".
